titleStmt.title: Remarks on the Quakers case, deliver'd to the Parliament

notesStmt.note: Requesting that the use of affirmation in place of oaths, already granted to Quakers in England, be extended to all of Great Britain.
NUC pre-1956 lists a 2 p. version of this publication as issued ca. 1710.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
